DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare human insulin inhalation powder plus insulin glargine inject insulin ( regular human insulin insulin lispro ) plus insulin glargine lower blood sugar level .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus least 24 month Injecting insulin ( insulin lispro , aspart regular insulin , insulin lispro/aspart mixture , regular human insulin mixture ) last 24 month HbA1c equal less 11 % Nonsmokers , smoke least 6 month agree smoke ( cigar , cigarette pipe ) use smokeless tobacco duration study Satisfactory lung function result meet requirement study Previously receive form inhaled insulin Require daily total insulin dosage great 100 U Have current past history asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clinically relevant lung disease History presence liver disease History presence kidney disease
